data.title: Howto: Install VirtualBox and integrate it with Compiz [Archive]
data.meta_description:
Purpose of this how-to: 
 
Install and configure VirtualBox, set up a (virtual)  windows environment, and integrate it seamlessly with your Ubuntu desktop using Compiz.  
 
http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/9128/cubelargewm8.th.png http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/5053/exposesmallns6.png 
 
 
Requirements
